name: Bonescythe Gauntlets
tooltip:
Bonescythe GauntletsLevel 60

Rohan the Assassin at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Bonescythe Gauntlets if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Gauntlets, 8 Wartorn Leather Scraps, 1 Arcanite Bar and 5 Cured Rugged Hides.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Gauntlets
- Wartorn Leather Scrap x 8
- Arcanite Bar
- Cured Rugged Hide x 5
